['Nymphaea - These are the most common type of water lily and come in a variety of colors including pink, white, yellow, and red.', 'Victoria - Also known as "Asiatic" water lilies, these have larger blooms and are more tolerant of colder temperatures than Nymphaea.', 'Aponogeton - These water lilies have long, slender leaves and blooms that range in color from white to pink to red.', 'Belladonna - Also known as "Amazon" water lilies, these have large, showy blooms in shades of pink, yellow, and orange.', 'Hygrophila - These water lilies have striking, often bi-colored leaves and blooms that range in color from white to red to purple.', 'Coelogyne - These water lilies have long, thin leaves and delicate, tubular blooms in shades of pink, yellow, and white.', 'Dracaena - Also known as "Dragon\'s Blood" water lilies, these have large, sword-shaped leaves and blooms that range in color from red to purple.', 'Euryale - These water lilies have long, slender leaves and blooms that range in color from white to pink to red.', 'Nymphoides - Also known as "Water Clover" water lilies, these have small, delicate leaves and blooms that range in color from white to pink to yellow.', 'Pistia - These water lilies have large, flat leaves and blooms that range in color from green to purple to yellow.']
